meanings.sent1: The mononucleate cell contained only one nucleus.
meanings.sent2: The scientist observed the mononucleate structure under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The mononucleate organism was the star of the biology class.
meanings.sent4: Her focus was as sharp and singular as a mononucleate cell.
meanings.sent5: The mononucleate feature of the organism made it stand out among the rest.

meanings.definition: A cell with a single nucleus.
meanings.sent1: The mononucleate divided into two daughter cells during mitosis.
meanings.sent2: The mononucleate was easily identifiable under the lab equipment.
meanings.sent3: The mononucleate seemed to be the leader of the cell community.
meanings.sent4: The mononucleate was like a solo performer on the cellular stage.
meanings.sent5: The mononucleate's nucleus shone brightly within the cell.
